alert.note: Alert for Iowa; Lafayette (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 30 at 4:07PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Lafayette and southeastern Iowa Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 407 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Belmont, or 8 miles west of Darlington, moving north at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mineral Point, Darlington, Shullsburg, Belmont, Benton, Linden, Waldwick, Fayette, Hollandale, Calamine, Lead Mine, Yellowstone Lake St Park, London and Jonesdale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for south central Wisconsin.
